attributes.action: Legalize Cannabis/Hemp/Marijuana to save the planet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If all fossil fuels and their derivatives, as well as trees for paper and construction, were banned in order to save the planet, reverse the greenhouse effect and stop deforestation; then there is only one known annually renewable natural resource that is capable of providing the overall majority of the world's paper and textiles; meet all of the world's transportation, industrial and home energy needs, while simultaneously reducing pollution, rebuilding the soil and cleaning the atmosphere all at the same time... and that substance is the same one that has done it before . . . CANNABIS/HEMP/MARIJUANA!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
